entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:04 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
